instructions.title: Choose Your Base Tea
instructions.description: Start by selecting your favorite tea base. You can choose from black tea, green tea, oolong tea, or herbal tea. Each base will give your bubble tea a unique flavor profile.
instructions.tips: Green tea is perfect for a lighter, more refreshing taste, while black tea provides a stronger, more robust flavor.

instructions.title: Add Your Favorite Flavor
instructions.description: Mix in your preferred flavor syrup or powder. Popular choices include mango, strawberry, lychee, and passion fruit. You can also combine multiple flavors for a unique blend.
instructions.tips: Start with a small amount of flavor and adjust to your taste preference. Remember, you can always add more!

instructions.title: Select Your Toppings
instructions.description: Choose from a variety of toppings like tapioca pearls, pudding, jelly, or popping boba. These add texture and fun to your drink.
instructions.tips: Tapioca pearls are the classic choice, but don't be afraid to try new combinations!

instructions.title: Shake & Enjoy
instructions.description: Give your bubble tea a good shake to mix all the ingredients together. This ensures every sip has the perfect balance of flavors and toppings.
instructions.tips: Shake gently to avoid breaking the tapioca pearls, but make sure everything is well mixed.
